content.8: Moreover the Levites: Jeshua, Binnui, Kadmiel, Sherebiah, Judah,
content.9: Also Bakbukiah and Unni, their brethren,
content.10: And Jeshua begat Joiakim, Joiakim also begat Eliashib, and Eliashib begat Joiada,
content.11: And Joiada begat Jonathan, and Jonathan begat Jaddua.
content.12: And in the days of Joiakim were priests, the chief of the fathers: of Seraiah, Meraiah; of Jeremiah, Hananiah;
content.13: Of Ezra, Meshullam; of Amariah, Jehohanan;
content.14: Of Melicu, Jonathan; of Shebaniah, Joseph;
content.15: Of Harim, Adna; of Meraioth, Helkai;
content.16: Of Iddo, Zechariah; of Ginnethon, Meshullam;
content.17: Of Abijah, Zichri; of Miniamin, of Moadiah, Piltai;
content.18: Of Bilgah, Shammua; of Shemaiah, Jehonathan;
content.19: And of Joiarib, Mattenai; of Jedaiah, Uzzi;
content.20: Of Sallai, Kallai; of Amok, Eber;
content.21: Of Hilkiah, Hashabiah; of Jedaiah, Nethaneel.
content.22: The Levites in the days of Eliashib, Joiada, and Johanan, and Jaddua,
content.23: The sons of Levi, the chief of the fathers,
content.24: And the chief of the Levites: Hashabiah, Sherebiah, and Jeshua the son of Kadmiel, with their brethren over against them, to praise
content.25: Mattaniah, and Bakbukiah, Obadiah, Meshullam, Talmon, Akkub,
content.27: And at the dedication of the wall of Jerusalem they sought the Levites out of all their places, to bring them to Jerusalem, to keep the dedication with gladness, both with thanksgivings, and with singing,
content.28: And the sons of the singers gathered themselves together, both out of the plain country round about Jerusalem, and from the villages of Netophathi;
content.29: Also from the house of Gilgal, and out of the fields of Geba and Azmaveth: for the singers had builded them villages round about Jerusalem.
content.30: And the priests and the Levites purified themselves, and purified the people, and the gates, and the wall.
content.31: Then I brought up the princes of Judah upon the wall, and appointed two great
content.32: And after them went Hoshaiah, and half of the princes of Judah,
content.34: Judah, and Benjamin, and Shemaiah, and Jeremiah,
content.36: And his brethren, Shemaiah, and Azarael, Milalai, Gilalai, Maai, Nethaneel, and Judah, Hanani, with the musical instruments of David the man of God, and Ezra the scribe before them.
content.37: And at the fountain gate, which was over against them, they went up by the stairs of the city of David, at the going up of the wall, above the house of David, even unto the water gate eastward.
content.39: And from above the gate of Ephraim, and above the old gate, and above the fish gate, and the tower of Hananeel, and the tower of Meah, even unto the sheep gate: and they stood still in the prison gate.
content.41: And the priests; Eliakim, Maaseiah, Miniamin, Michaiah, Elioenai, Zechariah,
content.42: And Maaseiah, and Shemaiah, and Eleazar, and Uzzi, and Jehohanan, and Malchijah, and Elam, and Ezer. And the singers sang loud, with Jezrahiah
content.43: Also that day they offered great sacrifices, and rejoiced: for God had made them rejoice with great joy: the wives also and the children rejoiced: so that the joy of Jerusalem was heard even afar off.
content.44: And at that time were some appointed over the chambers for the treasures, for the offerings, for the firstfruits, and for the tithes, to gather into them out of the fields of the cities the portions of the law for the priests and Levites: for Judah rejoiced for the priests and for the Levites that waited.
content.45: And both the singers and the porters kept the ward of their God, and the ward of the purification, according to the commandment of David,
content.46: For in the days of David and Asaph of old
